english: Charge Standards for Admissions of National Museum of Taiwan History
title: 國立臺灣歷史博物館門票收費標準

history: Standards are promulgated by National Museum of Taiwan History Xing-Tzu No. 10020034191 on 26th, October, 2011 and are effective on 29th, October, 2011.
Standards amended by National Museum of Taiwan History Xing-Tzu No. 10420005681 on 18th, March, 2015.
Standards amended by National Museum of Taiwan History Xing-Tzu No. 10420015631 on 17th, June, 2015.

articles.content: The Standards are set forth pursuant to Article 10 of the Charges and Fees Act.
Admission Prices for the National Museum of Taiwan History are shown in the Appendix.

The Standard Prices shall take effect October 29, 2011.
The article of amendment is promulgated and is effective on the same date. 
The article is amended on 18th, March, 2015, and is effective on the same date.
